pages.speaker: whismur
lines: Mur!

pages.speaker: player
lines: You received a letter from Aster!

pages.speaker: whismur
lines: Mur murrr!

pages.speaker: player
lines: "I was finally able to bring everything to an end."

pages.speaker: player
lines: "I thank you for that."

pages.speaker: player
lines: "I think I'll spend some time now trying to find out if it's also possible to forge a new beginning for something once lost."

pages.speaker: player
lines: "Until we meet again,"

pages.speaker: player
lines: "-Zinnia"

pages.speaker: scientist
lines: The energy reading appears to be diffusing!

pages.speaker: scientist
lines: W-we can confirm that the meteoroid has been destroyed, sir!

pages.speaker: scientist
lines: Puh... P-P-P-P-P-P-Professor!

pages.speaker: scientist
lines: The meteoroid! The meteoroid—it's—! Thank the powers above! It's—!

pages.speaker: prof_cozmo
lines: Calm yourself, man!

pages.speaker: prof_cozmo
lines: Oh, who am I kidding! I'm so happy, I could kiss you!

pages.speaker: prof_cozmo
lines: We did it! We actually did it!

pages.speaker: prof_cozmo
lines: Wahahahaha! Success is ours!

pages.speaker: prof_cozmo
lines: Hahahaha...ha... Hah...

pages.speaker: wally
lines: I'll be leaving, then. Good-bye, Mom! Bye, Dad!

pages.speaker: wally_dad
lines: W-wait just a minute! Wally!

pages.speaker: wally_mom
lines: That's right! Are you OK?

pages.speaker: wally_mom
lines: You looked like you were in trouble recently when those strange thugs came around...

pages.speaker: wally
lines: Of course! My Pokémon and I are fit for anything!

pages.speaker: wally
lines: See, ' + q.player.username + ' got my Key Stone back for me.

pages.speaker: wally
lines: And Mr. Norman gave me a ticket to a resort that sounds really neat.

pages.speaker: wally
lines: I can't wait to go and check it out!

pages.speaker: wally_dad
lines: My, my... I never dreamed I would one day think that Wally was TOO well...

pages.speaker: wally_mom
lines: Yes... But he looks so honestly happy... that I can't help feeling happy, too.

pages.speaker: tabitha
lines: Uwaahhh!

pages.speaker: tabitha
lines: This conversation isn't proceeding as expected!

pages.speaker: maxie
lines: Ugh...

pages.speaker: tabitha
lines: If it has come to this, then I, Tabitha, shall handle this myself!

pages.speaker: tabitha
lines: Courtney!

pages.speaker: courtney
lines: Y-yes?!

pages.speaker: tabitha
lines: Apologize to Leader Maxie!

pages.speaker: courtney
lines: Hu-huh?! Ow...ch...

pages.speaker: tabitha
lines: Hurry up! OK?! Just say, "Sorry!"

pages.speaker: courtney
lines: I'm sorry! Leader Maxie, I'm sorry!

pages.speaker: courtney
lines: I won't do it...anymore! I'll never do anything...like that...again!

pages.speaker: courtney
lines: So please... Forgive... Forgive me.

pages.speaker: courtney
lines: Wah...wah... Sniffle...

pages.speaker: maxie
lines: What are you—?!

pages.speaker: courtney
lines: Sniff...sniffle... Ohh...ooh...

pages.speaker: maxie
lines: I understand.

pages.speaker: maxie
lines: Courtney.

pages.speaker: maxie
lines: I, the great Maxie, will forgive you.

pages.speaker: maxie
lines: But only on one condition!

pages.speaker: courtney
lines: Huh?!

pages.speaker: maxie
lines: You must...also forgive me.

pages.speaker: maxie
lines: Courtney. I never imagined... I never could have imagined...

pages.speaker: maxie
lines: How very loyal you were to me.

pages.speaker: maxie
lines: Nor did I imagine even one iota of the shock you must have experienced, due to my recent speech and conduct, or how it could have pained you.

pages.speaker: maxie
lines: The one who drove you to such an extreme act was me.

pages.speaker: maxie
lines: I am truly sorry for that.

pages.speaker: maxie
lines: You see, Courtney, I would like to start on a new path.

pages.speaker: maxie
lines: There are truths that I have learned because of the mistakes I have made.

pages.speaker: maxie
lines: They pit me against others who are not like me and against ideas that differ from mine.

pages.speaker: maxie
lines: They tell me the importance of understanding these others, even though we may continue to cause pain to one another.

pages.speaker: maxie
lines: And that holds true whether the opponent I face is human, Pokémon, or even the might of nature itself.

pages.speaker: maxie
lines: I will take this step forward, free from hesitation, and meet my foe.

pages.speaker: maxie
lines: And together we will find a way to create, not destroy.

pages.speaker: maxie
lines: Or so I hope. That is the vision that I, Maxie, have for Team Magma's future.

pages.speaker: maxie
lines: Will you come with me on this journey as well? Courtney.

pages.speaker: courtney
lines: Wahh... Uwahh... Waahhh!

pages.speaker: courtney
lines: Waahhh... Of course I will!

pages.speaker: maxie
lines: My... You certainly do cry a lot.

pages.speaker: tabitha
lines: Ahyahya!

pages.speaker: tabitha
lines: And that settles that! Ahyahyahyahya!

pages.speaker: steven
lines: I still owe you for your help at the Sky Pillar. Thank you for that.

pages.speaker: wallace
lines: Hahaha!

pages.speaker: wallace
lines: How unlike you to be so thoughtful.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: Heh...

pages.speaker: steven
lines: You know, this experience really brought it home for me again...

pages.speaker: steven
lines: That there is still so much about this world that I do not know.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: I wonder what would have happened to Hoenn...

pages.speaker: steven
lines: If ' + q.player.username + ' had not been here to aid us with this, and the incident with the super-ancient Pokémon...

pages.speaker: steven
lines: I alone was powerless to stop either.

pages.speaker: wallace
lines: There is no one person in this world who knows all.

pages.speaker: wallace
lines: None who can do all.

pages.speaker: wallace
lines: Steven... There is no cause for such worries or concern.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: Hmm.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: Heh. Don't worry.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: It's not that I am so shocked by my own disappointing performance. But rather...

pages.speaker: wallace
lines: Rather what?

pages.speaker: steven
lines: I was just thinking how much more there is I must learn about nature...about Pokémon...

pages.speaker: steven
lines: and about my fellow humans as well... If I am to keep living in this huge, wide world.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: I want to walk this world on my own two feet.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: To see it with my own eyes. To feel it on my very skin...

pages.speaker: steven
lines: I need to put into practice all of the advice I ever gave to ' + q.player.username + '.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: That's what I am thinking now.

pages.speaker: wallace
lines: ...? Steven... You can't intend to...

pages.speaker: steven
lines: Hah hah hah! But no need to fear...

pages.speaker: steven
lines: I won't just disappear at once.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: I'll still be around doing my duty on behalf of the Pokémon League.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: But, hmm...

pages.speaker: steven
lines: When the time does come for me to pursue my own hopes...

pages.speaker: steven
lines: Well... I hope that you, Wallace, will be behind me to lend a hand.

pages.speaker: wallace
lines: Hmph. It seems I have little choice.

pages.speaker: wallace
lines: I bow to the whims of the pampered heir. I, Wallace, will do this thing you wish.

pages.speaker: wallace
lines: Heh.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: Hah hah hah... Thank you, my friend...

pages.speaker: whismur
lines: Mum...

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: Aster...

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: It's over... It's all over...

pages.speaker: draconid_lady
lines: ...Zinnia, my child.

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: ...Grannie.

pages.speaker: grandma
lines: ...You have worked so hard.

pages.speaker: grandma
lines: ...It is enough, child. ...Be done with your burden. Let it go now.

pages.speaker: grandma
lines: For everything there must be an ending.

pages.speaker: grandma
lines: Only then... Only then can there be a new beginning.

pages.speaker: grandma
lines: This is immutable truth that all living things on this planet, great and small, must accept.

pages.speaker: grandma
lines: We Draconids have seen it in our history, as you have seen it in your own life.

pages.speaker: grandma
lines: Now is the time for rest.

pages.speaker: grandma
lines: Let down the great burden you have borne so long alone...

pages.speaker: grandma
lines: So that you might at last take a step forward toward new life.

pages.speaker: grandma
lines: Now is the time for rest...

pages.speaker: zinnia
lines: ... Yes.

pages.speaker: birch
lines: I suppose May and ' + q.player.username + ' have probably arrived by now...

pages.speaker: mrs_birch
lines: I imagine so.

pages.speaker: mom
lines: The weather is good today. They should get a good view of the stars.

pages.speaker: dad
lines: But you know...I really am glad we moved here from Johto.

pages.speaker: dad
lines: I think that meeting you, Birch, and Mrs. Birch and little May, has had a huge impact on ' + q.player.username + ''s life.

pages.speaker: mrs_birch
lines: Oh, it's just the same for our May.

pages.speaker: mrs_birch
lines: Don't you agree, dear?

pages.speaker: birch
lines: Of course!

pages.speaker: birch
lines: Whenever she does make it home, all May has to talk about is Pokémon and her precious friend ' + q.player.username + '.

pages.speaker: birch
lines: I think she's over the moon about this adventure and the great friend she's found.

pages.speaker: mom
lines: I think ours is just the same. They always looks so happy these days.

pages.speaker: dad
lines: I hope you'll continue to look after our ' + q.player.username + ' for many more years to come.

pages.speaker: birch
lines: Bwahahaha! Why, Norman! You don't even have to ask...

pages.speaker: birch
lines: Nothing could make me happier!

pages.speaker: dad
lines: Hahahaha... Thanks, old friend.

pages.speaker: mrs_birch
lines: ...Well then, dear, isn't it about time we were headed back home?

pages.speaker: mrs_birch
lines: I should get supper started...

pages.speaker: birch
lines: Oh, yes! Those kids'll probably be starving when they get home!

pages.speaker: mom
lines: Oh, I didn't make any plans yet for dinner... What do you think we should have, dear?

pages.speaker: dad
lines: Hmm. How about our little ' + q.player.username + ''s favorite?

pages.speaker: brendan
lines: That was amazing... So those are the Litleonids.!

pages.speaker: brendan
lines: I'm really gonna have to to thank your dad for this one.

pages.speaker: brendan
lines: 'Cause... Come on...

pages.speaker: brendan
lines: I feel like I've been knocked flat on my back......

pages.speaker: brendan
lines: ...Thanks, ' + q.player.username + '!

pages.speaker: brendan
lines: I'm really glad I got to see this with you.

pages.speaker: announcement
lines: Thank you for visiting the Mossdeep Space Center.

pages.speaker: announcement
lines: This center will be closing shortly.

pages.speaker: announcement
lines: Please make sure that you don't forget anything when you leave.

pages.speaker: brendan
lines: It's true what they say, though. Time really flies when you're having fun...

pages.speaker: brendan
lines: Well... Bye...

pages.speaker: brendan
lines: ' + q.player.username + '!

pages.speaker: brendan
lines: See you tomorrow!
